# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-tosca-aria-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-tosca/aria/aria/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/aria-1.1.0-20161226.163747-3.zip" && unzip -q -o -B common-tosca-aria-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f common-tosca-aria-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8204
RUN echo Open-O common-tosca-aria 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-tosca/aria/aria/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/aria-1.1.0-20161226.163747-3.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
